 The Internet African American History Challenge is a free resource that is used in educational settings around the world. This site is used in classrooms, homes and offices. (Click Here To See Survey Data) If you believe this a a valuable online resource, there are a few ways you can support it. You can 1) buy a book from "The African American Childrens Bookshelf"; 2) make a purchase from DeepDiscounts.Com - (they are both related websites or 3) you can click here to make a cash donation. 

Our intention is to offer to only those interested. If not the mechanizim is in place for you to decide.
